name: Labyrinth
body:
### Welcome to the Labyrinth.
So after an year of screwing around with Unreal 4 using blueprints, I finally have the confidence (and the know-how) to finally tackle Gameplay elements at a C++ level. 

I would also recommend going through Tom Looman's [website](http://www.tomlooman.com/); it is a treasure trove of knowledge.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
